A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Safe. It did what TFA did; take elements from original movies\, jumble them up and piece together a movie. Characters serve as plot devices for the soft reboot\, only to be thrown away with ease\, shattering the suspended disbelief. I cannot express how disappointed I am in this movie. Nothing new. No risks. Weird ass decisions that are tonally off by 180 degrees\, and comedy that was out of place. The villain isn't a threat\, nothing new is learned about anything substantial.
